Title: Better Angels
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Evan T. Reilly, Glen Mazzara
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: Shane's antagonistic behaviour reaches new heights, while Carl suffers the consequences of his actions.
